question: How many albums are there?
sql_query: SELECT count(*) FROM ALBUM

question: Find all the customer information in state NY.
sql_query: SELECT * FROM CUSTOMER WHERE State  =  'NY'

question: What are the first names and last names of the employees who live in Calgary city.
sql_query: SELECT FirstName ,  LastName FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE City  =  'Calgary'

question: What are the distinct billing countries of the invoices?
sql_query: SELECT distinct(BillingCountry) FROM INVOICE

question: Find the names of all artists that have 'a' in their names.
sql_query: SELECT Name FROM ARTIST WHERE Name LIKE '%a%'

question: Find the title of all the albums of the artist 'AC/DC'.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALBUM AS T1 JOIN ARTIST AS T2 ON T1.ArtistId  =  T2.ArtistId WHERE T2.Name  =  'Metallica'

question: Find the name of the artist who made the album 'Balls to the Wall'.
sql_query: SELECT T2.Name FROM ALBUM AS T1 JOIN ARTIST AS T2 ON T1.ArtistId  =  T2.ArtistId WHERE T1.Title  =  'Balls to the Wall'

question: What is the average unit price of all the tracks?
sql_query: SELECT AVG(UnitPrice) FROM TRACK

question: What are the durations of the longest and the shortest tracks in milliseconds?
sql_query: SELECT max(Milliseconds) ,  min(Milliseconds) FROM TRACK

question: Show the album names, ids and the number of tracks for each album.
sql_query: SELECT T1.Title ,  T2.AlbumID ,  COUNT(*) FROM ALBUM AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId GROUP BY T2.AlbumID

question: Find the name of the genre that is most frequent across all tracks.
sql_query: SELECT T1.Name FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId GROUP BY T2.GenreId ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What is the least common media type in all tracks?
sql_query: SELECT T1.Name FROM MEDIATYPE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.MediaTypeId  =  T2.MediaTypeId GROUP BY T2.MediaTypeId ORDER BY COUNT(*) ASC LIMIT 1

question: What are the titles and ids for albums containing tracks with unit price greater than 1?
sql_query: SELECT T1.Title ,  T2.AlbumID FROM ALBUM AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId WHERE T2.UnitPrice  >  1 GROUP BY T2.AlbumID

question: Count the number of tracks that are part of the rock genre.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId WHERE T1.Name  =  'Rock'

question: What is the average unit price of tracks that belong to Jazz genre?
sql_query: SELECT AVG(UnitPrice) FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId WHERE T1.Name  =  'Jazz'

question: Find the full name of the customer with the email 'luisg@embraer.com.br'.
sql_query: SELECT FirstName ,  LastName FROM CUSTOMER WHERE Email  =  'luisg@embraer.com.br'

question: How many customers have email that contains 'gmail.com'?
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CUSTOMER WHERE Email LIKE '%gmail.com%'

question: Count the number of customers that have an email containing 'gmail.com'.
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CUSTOMER WHERE Email LIKE '%gmail.com%'

question: What is the first name and last name employee helps the customer with first name Leonie?
sql_query: SELECT T2.FirstName ,  T2.LastName FROM CUSTOMER AS T1 JOIN EMPLOYEE AS T2 ON T1.SupportRepId  =  T2.EmployeeId WHERE T1.FirstName  =  'Leonie'

question: Find the cities corresponding to employees who help customers with the postal code 70174.
sql_query: SELECT T2.City FROM CUSTOMER AS T1 JOIN EMPLOYEE AS T2 ON T1.SupportRepId  =  T2.EmployeeId WHERE T1.PostalCode  =  '70174'

question: How many distinct cities does the employees live in?
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT city) FROM EMPLOYEE

question: What are the invoice dates for customers with the first name Astrid and the last name Gruber?
sql_query: SELECT T2.InvoiceDate FROM CUSTOMER AS T1 JOIN INVOICE AS T2 ON T1.CustomerId  =  T2.CustomerId WHERE T1.FirstName  =  'Astrid' AND LastName  =  'Gruber'

question: How many tracks are in the AAC audio file media type?
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEDIATYPE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.MediaTypeId  =  T2.MediaTypeId WHERE T1.Name  =  'AAC audio file'

question: Find the average millisecond length of Latin and Pop tracks.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(Milliseconds) FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId WHERE T1.Name  =  'Latin' OR T1.Name  =  'Pop'

question: Please show the employee first names and ids of employees who serve at least 10 customers.
sql_query: SELECT T1.FirstName ,  T1.SupportRepId FROM CUSTOMER AS T1 JOIN EMPLOYEE AS T2 ON T1.SupportRepId  =  T2.EmployeeId GROUP BY T1.SupportRepId HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  10

question: What are the last names of employees who serve at most 20 customers?
sql_query: SELECT T1.LastName FROM CUSTOMER AS T1 JOIN EMPLOYEE AS T2 ON T1.SupportRepId  =  T2.EmployeeId GROUP BY T1.SupportRepId HAVING COUNT(*)  <=  20

question: Please list all album titles in alphabetical order.
sql_query: SELECT Title FROM ALBUM ORDER BY Title

question: Find the names of artists that do not have any albums.
sql_query: SELECT Name FROM ARTIST EXCEPT SELECT T2.Name FROM ALBUM AS T1 JOIN ARTIST AS T2 ON T1.ArtistId  =  T2.ArtistId

question: Find the average unit price of tracks from the Rock genre.
sql_query: SELECT AVG(T2.UnitPrice) FROM GENRE AS T1 JOIN TRACK AS T2 ON T1.GenreId  =  T2.GenreId WHERE T1.Name  =  'Rock'

question: Find the birth dates corresponding to employees who live in the city of Edmonton.
sql_query: SELECT BirthDate FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE City  =  'Edmonton'

question: What are the distinct unit prices of all tracks?
sql_query: SELECT distinct(UnitPrice) FROM TRACK

question: Cound the number of artists who have not released an album.
sql_query: SELECT count(*) FROM ARTIST WHERE artistid NOT IN(SELECT artistid FROM ALBUM)

question: What are the album titles for albums containing both 'Reggae' and 'Rock' genre tracks?
sql_query: SELECT T1.Title FROM Album AS T1 JOIN Track AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId JOIN Genre AS T3 ON T2.GenreID  =  T3.GenreID WHERE T3.Name  =  'Reggae' INTERSECT SELECT T1.Title FROM Album AS T1 JOIN Track AS T2 ON T1.AlbumId  =  T2.AlbumId JOIN Genre AS T3 ON T2.GenreID  =  T3.GenreID WHERE T3.Name  =  'Rock'
